name: RPPG
description:
Grab your paddle and get ready for an adventure on Pong Island, an island where everyone fights using the art as pong! Explore different areas and fight enemies as you work to stop Ping Kong!

The game is currently in development and not fully completed. Currently only chapter 1 is available to play, but up to 10 chapters will be released over time. 

Support the devs!
Ehan Goosch: Programmer, Designer, Composer.
TanookieToons: Artist, Character Designer.

Join the community Discord!
RPPG Cool Gang!
